price: 55. Mpe Nkolo wa yo ayebi malamu penza manso maye mazali o likolo mpe na nsé, mpe totombola bantoma basusu likolo ya baninga, mpe topesaki Dáwud zabur(1).
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَلَقَدۡ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ زَبُورٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka aʿlamu biman fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walaqad faḍḍalnā baʿḍa al-nabiyīna ʿalā baʿḍin waātaynā dāwūda zabūran
